categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith actors

nodes.text: Rebecca Jackson Mendoza (born January 1, 1973) is an Australian actress, singer, and dancer. She was part of the pop duo "Jackson Mendoza" with her sister Natalie. In Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith, she made a brief appearance as Queen Breha Organa, the wife of Senator Bail Organa and the adoptive mother of Princess Leia.
